name: Roly-Polo
description:
Roly-Polo it's a fast and fun sport videogame for up to four players.

In the game you control a PillBugBear (or a pair of them if you chose Twins-Mode on the options menu), to win you have to score 15 points by throwing the purple ball thought the ring goals.

The controllers have an auto throw to goal ring helper that you can turn on and off as you wish on the options menu.

It's programed to be played as local-multiplayer against friends or CPU controlled players, and doesn't have online code but it can be played online with some help from PARSEC (https://parsecgaming.com/) or Remote Play Detached.

The game can be played on Windows, Linux, Ouya and Android, it has support for gamepads, keyboard, and touchscreen, feel free to download the Demo and test it on your system.

By the time of release it comes with 8 hand-made stages that are selected one after the other in pseudo random order for non-stop fun, and more will be added in the future.
